ProteinName	Protein N-lysine methyltransferase METTL21D (EC 2.1.1.-) (Methyltransferase-like protein 21D) (VCP lysine methyltransferase) (VCP-KMT) (Valosin-containing protein lysine methyltransferase)
GeneName	VCPKMT C14orf138 METTL21D
Length	229
Function	Protein N-lysine methyltransferase that specifically trimethylates 'Lys-315' of VCP/p97; this modification may decrease VCP ATPase activity.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm
